Uses of Interface
org.jruyi.io.IDoubleCodec

  • Packages that use IDoubleCodec 
    Package Description
    org.jruyi.io
    JRuyi IO Package Version 1.2

    • Uses of IDoubleCodec in org.jruyi.io

      Methods in org.jruyi.io that return IDoubleCodec 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static IDoubleCodec DoubleCodec.bigEndian()
      Returns a big-endian double codec.
      IDoubleCodec DoubleCodec.IDoubleCodecProvider.bigEndianDoubleCodec()
      Returns a big-endian double codec.
      static IDoubleCodec DoubleCodec.littleEndian()
      Returns a little-endian double codec.
      IDoubleCodec DoubleCodec.IDoubleCodecProvider.littleEndianDoubleCodec()
      Returns a little-endian double codec.
      Methods in org.jruyi.io with parameters of type IDoubleCodec 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double IBuffer.get(int index, IDoubleCodec codec)
      Uses the specified codec to decode the bytes starting at the specified index from the underlying buffer into a double value and returns the resultant double value.
      IBuffer IBuffer.prepend(double d, IDoubleCodec codec)
      Writes the bytes, encoded from the specified double value d with the specified codec, to the head of this buffer.
      double IBuffer.read(IDoubleCodec codec)
      Uses the specified codec to decode the bytes starting at position from the underlying buffer into a double value and returns the resultant double value.
      IBuffer IBuffer.set(int index, double d, IDoubleCodec codec)
      Sets the bytes starting at the specified index to the ones encoded from the specified double value d with the specified codec.
      IBuffer IBuffer.write(double d, IDoubleCodec codec)
      Writes the bytes, decoded from the specified double value d with the specified codec, to the end of this buffer.
